Name: 无限次元
About the game: --------------------------------------------------------------------- The first edition of 'infinite dimension' was first released in 2015 Rougelike: randomly generated map elements Sword and magic theme: the combination of Japanese adventurer and fantasy theme in my mind Collection and Cultivation: each equipment upgrade to the top has the legendary equipment of branch route, a total of 8 professional branches, warrior, mage, priest, assassin, knight, warlock, Ranger, Bard, and 8 beautiful girl characters Plot breakthrough: compared with the classic adventure theme plot, your choice will have a certain impact on the current team Half round combat system: if you don't move, you will be killed DIY system: you can draw a picture of yourself, make a character, dub him or her, and share it with friends --------------------------------------------------------------------- Game synopsis: After the destruction of the gods, there was no God here The earth is torn apart and space is falling apart In the epic poems handed down by the bards, colorful legends are remembered that day. A dead house came through here, As a harmless human and Animal Crossing rookie, He was hunted by unknown forces for no reason On the way to escape, I gradually found that many things in this world seemed to be similar Until one day, a girl dressed as a sacrifice came to him and called him the Savior, So an old-fashioned plot begins. The dead house becomes the main character In the face of the devil's siege and interception. The second year of secondary school was forced to grow up God has given him the burden of defeating the devil and the ability to connect all sides The vast universe is infinite You can use whatever you want He gradually discovered his near limitless potential The truth of the Savior is gradually revealed This is the world of sword and magic This is the story of the birth of the brave This is the absurd and hot-blooded youth This is a legend destined to go down in history
